about_the_game:
Tentacle Typer is a Lovecraftian text editor. You're a giant tentacle monster with a magic mechanical typewriter. Psychically rouse elaborate mechanisms by typing almost whatever you want. Gain different magic spells depending on what you write. Engage in magical combat with otherworldly beings while creating text documents. You probably haven't played anything quite like it.

Features

  • Write and export .txt files with your many tentacle arms.
  • The environment and rules of reality react based on what you write.
  • Find magic tools and mechanical upgrades for your typewriter.
  • Secret doors, secret rooms, secret words and secret secrets to uncover.
  • Music by Jordan Woerndle



Write a letter to your crush to turn on the crushing machine.

Immanentize dark prophecies while writing jokes for your standup routine.

Grow a thick chitinous shell by writing the rough draft to that novel you've been meaning to start for years.

name: Tentacle Typer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-Bit)
  • Processor: ~3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Tentacle Typer is a Lovecraftian text editor RPG experience. You're a giant tentacle monster with a magic mechanical typewriter, and you're trapped in a steampunk mansion. Psychically rouse elaborate mechanisms by typing almost whatever you want.
